Client Side Validation in Rails

Setup Gem How to setup application to use rails_jq_validations gem. Add gem “rails_jq_validations” in gemfile gem "rails_jq_validations", git: "git@github.com:jbmyid/rails_jq_validations.git" Run bundle install Add js to your application.js //= require rails_jq_validations/form_validator Adding Client side validation to form Considering you are having Product model and you have added validates :name, presence: true...
